moves.name: swift
moves.effect_entries: Never misses.

moves.name: snore
moves.effect_entries: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

moves.name: giga-impact
moves.effect_entries: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

moves.name: round
moves.effect_entries: Has double power if it’s used more than once per turn.

moves.name: psybeam
moves.effect_entries: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

moves.name: thunder-punch
moves.effect_entries: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

moves.name: focus-blast
moves.effect_entries: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

moves.name: psycho-cut
moves.effect_entries: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

moves.name: poison-jab
moves.effect_entries: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

moves.name: take-down
moves.effect_entries: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

moves.name: shock-wave
moves.effect_entries: Never misses.

moves.name: hyper-beam
moves.effect_entries: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

moves.effect_entries: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

moves.name: knock-off
moves.effect_entries: Target drops its held item.

moves.name: vine-whip
moves.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: secret-power
moves.effect_entries: Has a 30% chance to inflict a status effect which depends upon the terrain.

moves.effect_entries: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.
